next_steps.note: "Research and read 3-5 poems by a poet whose style you admire to gain inspiration and identify techniques to potentially emulate.",
"Free-write for 15-20 minutes, generating raw text without self-editing, focusing on one of the brainstormed themes.",
"Draft a short poem (8-12 lines) based on the free-writing, prioritizing getting ideas down on 'paper' rather than perfection.",
"Identify one resource for poetry feedback (e.g., a writing group, online forum, trusted friend) and plan when to share the draft for review."

completed.note: {"note":"\"Brainstorm 5-10 potential themes or subjects for the poetry (e.g., nature, loss, joy, city life, a specific historical event).\",","timestamp":"2025-11-04T21:12:13.475445","metadata":{},"completed_at":"2025-11-04T21:12:55.415Z","original_category":"next_steps"}
